thread.section_title: Parts Town Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Parts Town | partstown.com | 3 of 120
thread.title: Tim

author: Tim
title: Tim
text: I needed a part for our 12 year old commercial dishwasher. They had the parts diagram from the manufacturer easily available on the website. we ordered the part which was in stock and had within 4 days. Probably save at least $100 over bringing in a service tech. My only complaint was that we had to by some plumbing parts at the local hardware store for the part to fit. It would have been nice if the parts diagram had choices based on size of pipe or serial number. That's the only reason I didn't give them 5 stars
